instruction: Show failed login events in the last week
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-7d "rule.groups{}"="authentication_failed" | stats count by agent.name, rule.description

instruction: Find successful authentication events in the last 7 days
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-7d "rule.groups{}"="authentication_success" | stats count by agent.name

instruction: Get alerts by severity level in the last 30 days
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-30d | stats count by rule.level | sort -rule.level

instruction: Count alerts per agent in the last 30 days
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-30d | stats count by agent.name | sort -count

instruction: Show top 10 agents by alert count this week
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-7d | stats count by agent.name | sort -count | head 10

instruction: Find sudo command executions in the last 7 days
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-7d "rule.groups{}"="sudo" | stats count by agent.name, rule.description

instruction: Show file integrity changes in the last week
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-7d "rule.groups{}"="syscheck" | stats count by syscheck.event

instruction: Find web attacks in the last 30 days
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-30d "rule.groups{}"="web" | stats count by agent.name, rule.description

instruction: Show PAM authentication events this week
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-7d "rule.groups{}"="pam" | stats count by agent.name

instruction: Find audit events in the last 7 days
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-7d "rule.groups{}"="audit" | stats count by rule.description

instruction: Get hourly alert distribution for the last 24 hours
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-24h | timechart span=1h count by rule.level

instruction: Find the top 10 most common alerts this month
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-30d | stats count by rule.description | sort -count | head 10

instruction: Count unique rules triggered in the last week
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-7d | stats dc(rule.id) as unique_rules

instruction: Show alert timeline by hour for the last day
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-24h | timechart span=1h count

instruction: Find all alerts containing SSH in the description
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-7d rule.description="*SSH*" | stats count by rule.description, agent.name

instruction: Find password-related events in the last 30 days
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-30d rule.description="*password*" | stats count by agent.name, rule.description

instruction: Find the latest 50 alerts
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-24h | head 50 | table _time agent.name rule.description rule.level

instruction: Calculate alert rate per hour for the last week
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-7d | timechart span=1h count | stats avg(count) as avg_per_hour

instruction: Find agents with more than 100 alerts this week
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-7d | stats count by agent.name | where count > 100

instruction: Show distribution of alerts by rule group
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-7d | stats count by "rule.groups{}" | sort -count | head 20

instruction: Find rare alerts (fewer than 10 occurrences)
output: index=wazuh-alerts earliest=-30d | stats count by rule.description | where count < 10 | sort count
